title: WAMC News Podcast - Episode 328
dc:creator: WAMC Northeast Public Radio
description: Four years ago, Ulster County Executive Pat Ryan finished second in the Democratic primary in New York’s 19th Congressional district. Now, he is finally heading to Washington.
itunes:subtitle: Four years ago, Ulster County Executive Pat Ryan finished second in the Democratic primary in New York’s 19th Congressional district. Now, he is finally heading to Washington.
